title: Managing Anxiety with CBT
description: Learn and practice techniques to reduce anxiety using cognitive behavioral therapy

questions.prompt: Describe a situation that typically triggers your anxiety:
questions.placeholder: Example: Speaking in front of groups...

questions.prompt: Rate your anxiety level when thinking about this situation:
What thoughts go through your mind in this situation?
questions.placeholder: Example: Everyone will think I'm incompetent...

questions.prompt: Which physical sensations do you typically experience during anxiety? (Select most common)
How do you typically respond to or cope with these anxious feelings?
questions.placeholder: Example: I avoid the situation entirely...

questions.prompt: Which coping strategy is most effective for long-term anxiety management?
What evidence contradicts your anxious thought?
questions.placeholder: Example: I've given successful presentations before...

questions.prompt: Deep breathing exercises can help reduce the physical symptoms of anxiety.
Write a more balanced alternative to your anxious thought:
questions.placeholder: Example: While I feel nervous, I can handle this presentation...

questions.prompt: After reframing your thought, rate your anxiety level now:
